name: Falldown x64
description:
Remember that game on your TI-85? Falldown? It was awesome, wasn't it?

Well, this game is that game. Play by using your J/K keys, or your Arrow keys on your keyboard.

That's all there is to it.

This is my first-ever released game. I made this it in less than 2 weeks, working a maximum of 5 hours / day (most days, it was more like 2 or 3 hrs). This game is purpose-built for the Low Rez Jam, and I'm proud that I finished.

But, I didn't have time to do everything I would've liked. I had to scramble to finish this game. "Everything I would've liked" includes play testing and making the sure the game is actually any fun... I plan to add features later :-D
